author: Special Correspondent
text:
J. K. Tripathy, Additional Director of General of Police (Law and Order), held discussion with the senior police officials of the westerns districts on the security arrangements during the run-up for the Assembly elections.

He discussed steps to be taken to ensure peaceful polling and strengthening security arrangements in sensitive polling stations.

Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan, DIG of Police (Salem Range) S. Nagarajan, Superintendents of Police – G. Subbulakshmi (Salem district), S. Maheswaran (Namakkal), J. Loganathan (Dharmapuri) and R. Thirunavukkarasu (Krishnagiri) participated in the meeting.
title: ADGP holds discussion
